Name: Clipper Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Light, easy drinking and very refreshing.
History: Peggy Guggenheim's biography mentions that this cocktail was served during the 1940s on the Boeing flying boats known as Clippers.
Nutrition: One serving of Clipper Cocktail contains 177 calories
